import{CONFIG}from'../constants/config';// EXACTAMENTE IGUAL que en el original
export const StorageService={save:(key,data)=>{try{localStorage.setItem(key,JSON.stringify(data));return true;}catch(error){console.error('Error guardando en localStorage:',error);return false;}},load:function(key){let defaultValue=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:null;try{const item=localStorage.getItem(key);return item?JSON.parse(item):defaultValue;}catch(error){console.error('Error cargando de localStorage:',error);return defaultValue;}},remove:key=>{try{localStorage.removeItem(key);return true;}catch(error){console.error('Error eliminando de localStorage:',error);return false;}},clear:()=>{try{Object.values(CONFIG.STORAGE_KEYS).forEach(key=>{localStorage.removeItem(key);});return true;}catch(error){console.error('Error limpiando localStorage:',error);return false;}}};
